snippet: The House minority leader writes, “Limiting taxes on the wealthy and special interests has been the central aim of Republicans in Congress for decades.”...
abstract: Letter from House minority leader Nancy Pelosi comments on Paul Krugman August 12 Op-Ed column on why Republicans continue to support Donald Trump.
lead_paragraph: The House minority leader writes, “Limiting taxes on the wealthy and special interests has been the central aim of Republicans in Congress for decades.”

headline.main: Nancy Pelosi, on G.O.P. Protecting the Rich
